sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSHOLIDAY where HOLIDAYDATE = :holidaydate and FESTIVAL = :festival and WORKFLAG = :workflag
insert into LNSHOLIDAY (HOLIDAYDATE, FESTIVAL, WORKFLAG) values (:holidaydate, :festival, :workflag)
delete from LNSHOLIDAY where HOLIDAYDATE = :holidaydate and FESTIVAL = :festival
insert into LNSHOLIDAY (HOLIDAYDATE, FESTIVAL, WORKFALG) values (:holidaydate, :festival, :workfalg)
update LNSHOLIDAY set WORKFALG = :workfalg where HOLIDAYDATE = :holidaydate and FESTIVAL = :festival
select HOLIDAYDATE, FESTIVAL, WORKFALG from LNSHOLIDAY where HOLIDAYDATE = :holidaydate and FESTIVAL = :festival
